import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { differenceInCalendarMonths} from 'date-fns' const Showdrugs = () => { const [drugs, setValues] = useState([""]); useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8081/showdrugs").then(res => setValues(res.data)).catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) const handleDelete = async (id) => { try { await axios.delete("http://localhost:8081/showdrugs/"+id) window.location.reload() } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } return (

AVAILABLE DRUGS

{ drugs.map((data, i) => ( )) }
Drug name Drug Category Quantity Date added Expiry Date
{data.DrugName} {data.DrugCategory} {data.Quantity} {data.DateAdded} {data.ExpiryDate} Update
Add
) } export default Showdrugs;
